name: DataHunter (A_ColtZz)
description:
In this game you try to survive by collecting data chips and destroying/avoiding the drones who are after your data. You play as the Data hunter which goes jumping around (and shooting) in the cyber net world.

Made for the ludum dare 46 gamejam link to the page here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/datahunter
